alert.note: Alert for Herkimer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 06 at 12:13AM EDT until April 06 at 6:49PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...West Canada Creek At Kast Bridge. * WHEN...Until this evening. * IMPACTS...At 7.0 feet, Moderate flood stage and several RV parks are inundated with one to two feet of water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:15 PM EDT Wednesday the stage was 5.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early this morning to a crest of 7.2 feet. It will then fall below flood stage this afternoon. - Flood stage is 6.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && West Canada Creek Kast Bridge Flood Stage: 6.0 Observed Stage at Wed 11 pm: 5.2 Forecast: Thu 2 am 6.0 Thu 8 am 7.2 Thu 2 pm 5.7 Thu 8 pm 5.2 Fri 2 am 4.8 Fri 8 am 4.6 Fri 2 pm 4.5 Fri 8 pm 4.4 Sat 2 am 4.3 Sat 8 am 4.2 Sat 2 pm 4.2 Sat 8 pm 4.1 &&
